review.classdesign.jammy

Class JammyPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.JammyPreferences

  • public final class JammyPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains set of tools methods that are used to manipulate plugin preferences.
    Author:
    fv

    • Method Detail

      • propertyChange

        protected static void propertyChange(org.eclipse.jface.util.PropertyChangeEvent event)
        Functional method that acts as a IPropertyChangeListener in order to handle preferences changing, by saving the updated preferences. TODO : Trigger a single save by preference page validation in UI.
        Parameters:
        event - Target property change event.

      • load

        protected static void load(org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferenceStore store)
        Loads the plugin preferences into the given store. Aims to be called only by the Jammy plugin.
        Parameters:
        store - Preference store to load preferences into.
